des: "Many years ago, I asked my mother why these are called wine drop cookies  if there wasn't any wine in the recipe. She just said  because they were so rich and good.  A soft molasses cookie with easy batter preparation."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C).
Beat oil, sugar and eggs.  Add molasses, vanilla, and water.
Stir in dry ingredients.
Drop by teaspoons on cookie sheets sprayed with non stick spray.
Bake  for 15 minutes.  Cool tray slightly before removing.
